description: Tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, painted design on white ground, in center front a shield with a medallion showing a house in blue and white, sides and back decorated with conventionalized floral forms in blue, green, yellow and overglaze orange, pewter lip and domed lid of German type, ball thumbpiece with flat fillet around center and buttom finial, German XVIIIc NO DIMS. ON CAT. CARDS
title: Tankard
